channel.title: Altering exp rates
channel.description: how do you change the exp rates per hit. plz be specific. like tell me where to go and what to search for not just where to go plz. thanx

item.title: Altering exp rates
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

[quote=“cj own u, post:3, topic:286257”]could u plz tell me what comes before the number cuz i get 100xp per hit and there is hundreds of the number 100 in the client.java

so could u look in your client and tell me what it is that comes before the ‘100’[/quote]

TotalExp = (double)(100*hitDiff)

Read full topic
